definition: to attach importance to sth/to value

sentences.english: To value the employment courses and practical training.
sentences.chinese: 重視就業學程與實作訓練。

sentences.english: In comparison with the Americans, Chinese are more sensitive about their face.
sentences.chinese: 和美國人相比，中國人非常重視他們的臉面。

sentences.english: Being a stick-in-the-mud, people don't value his opinions.
sentences.chinese: 他是位呆頭呆腦的人，大家不重視他的意見。

sentences.english: Did either party emphasize the relationship as much as the settlement?
sentences.chinese: 有認何一方把結果等同於關係來重視呢？

sentences.english: The concern has been raised recently over tick-borne infectious diseases in the field of infectious diseases in China.
sentences.chinese: 近來，蜱媒傳染病引起了國內傳染病界的重視。

sentences.english: The Chinese Communist Party and government attach great importance to China-DPRK ties.
sentences.chinese: 中國黨和政府高度重視中朝關係。

sentences.english: But in Afro-Asian areas, the solution is not put enough attention.
sentences.chinese: 但是亞非落後地區的飲水狀況卻沒有得到人們的重視。

sentences.english: Rabbit Garden Imperial Book Repository should obtain the descendant scholars' enough attention.
sentences.chinese: 敦煌本《兔園策府》應該得到後代學者的足夠重視。

sentences.english: Value those times with you kids.
sentences.chinese: 重視這段與孩子在一起的時光。

sentences.english: They always are keeping their own status, concern self-value achievement.
sentences.chinese: 他們以自我爲中心，重視自我價值的實現。

sentences.english: The point I want to give you is that we are taking this trip very seriously.
sentences.chinese: 我想給你們指出的一點是，我們對此次訪問非常重視。

sentences.english: When we investigate soils and divide them, We must pay a great attention to the geological factors in depth.
sentences.chinese: 爲此，在土壤調查與區劃時，必須重視深部地質因素。

sentences.english: They take themselves seriously the appearance of other in part, with be concerned about face-saving about.
sentences.chinese: 他們重視自己另一半的相貌，與愛面子有關。

sentences.english: World each main scented rice producing country extremely pays attention to the research and development of the aroma rice.
sentences.chinese: 世界各主要香稻生產國對香稻的研究及開發極爲重視。

sentences.english: One resource I rather value is my e-mail inbox.
sentences.chinese: 我的電子郵件收件箱是我非常重視的一個資源。

sentences.english: Fusing attaches applique to another fabric.
sentences.chinese: 福興重視另一織物貼花。

definition: to approve of/to endorse/to acknowledge/to recognize/to identify oneself with
regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
to have sth to do with/to relate to/related to/to concern/concerning
to praise/to approve of/to show approval
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
